description: An illustration of a brown bottle of presumably vanilla extract tipped over a gray measuring spoon; the bottle has a grayish-blue label with an illustration of two vanilla beans with a yellow five-pointed star overlapping them. Two drops of vanilla extract drop from the lip of the bottle into the bowl of a measuring spoon which is full of extract.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
